#summary How to get support for jquery.cookies.js
#labels Featured,Phase-Support

= What to do if you're having problems =

Please read the [http://code.google.com/p/cookies/wiki/Documentation documentation] on this project.  If you're having problems, search the [http://code.google.com/p/cookies/issues/list issues] to see if problems have been reported and/or resolved.  If these steps do not provide resolution for your problem, please open an issue.
